HealthcareProviderTaxonomy.name: HealthcareProviderTaxonomy
HealthcareProviderTaxonomy.description: Represents the taxonomy or subspecialty codes for a provider or facility. A provider or facility can have multiple taxonomies.

AccountId.description: The business account associated with the provider taxonomy.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date when the healthcare provider taxonomy is active.

EffectiveTo.description: The date when the healthcare provider taxonomy is no longer active.

HealthcareProviderId.description: The healthcare provider associated with the healthcare provider taxonomy.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the healthcare provider taxonomy is active (true) or not (false).

IsPrimaryTaxonomy.description: Indicates whether the healthcare provider taxonomy is the provider's primary taxonomy (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the healthcare provider taxonomy.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

PractitionerId.description: The practitioner associated with the healthcare provider taxonomy.

SourceSystem.description: System from which the record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of the system from which the record was sourced.

TaxonomyId.description: The care taxonomy associated with the heathcare provider taxonomy.
